thread.title: Great experience in Pigalle
thread.title_full: Great experience in Pigalle - Review of Le Pigalle, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Gaston A
title: Great experience in Pigalle
text: The personnel at the hotel are really friendly and charming. In addition, the facilities and rooms are really stylish and modern: its creative decoration includes pieces from different artists and you get to have a customized iPad to enjoy a pre-made playlist to set an authentic 'Le Pigalle' mood and to interact with concierge at anytime. The only tiny drawback is that breakfast options are a bit limited, but you can find great food within 100 metres.
